base_text: A warehouse starts the day with 120 units of stock. In the morning, it ships out 35 units. Later, it receives a delivery equal to half of the remaining stock. In the afternoon, 18 units are shipped out. How many units remain at the end of the day?
Alice has 10 coins. She gives 3 coins to Bob. Bob then gives Alice half of the coins he has. Alice gives 2 coins to Charlie. How many coins does Alice have at the end?
A machine processes items in batches. It starts with 40 items. Each batch removes 8 items, but after every second batch, 5 new items are added. After 4 batches, how many items remain?
A temperature starts at 20 degrees. It increases by 5 degrees every hour for two hours, then decreases by 3 degrees for the next three hours. What is the final temperature?
A bank account has £500. £120 is withdrawn, then interest equal to 10% of the remaining balance is added. After that, £50 is withdrawn. What is the final balance?
